field.name: combobox_border
field.descr: Border around the combo-box's current element and button

field.name: button_focus_border
field.descr: Focus border around the combo-box's button

field.name: editable_combobox_minimum_width
field.descr: Minimum width of the input field in an editable combo-box. If the list of combo-box items is empty or is smaller than this, this sets the minimum width of the input field. The standard combo-box's width gets sized according to the number of fixed items in the combo-box. This allows a reasonable width for the input field even if the list of existing combo-box items is an empty list or if it's very short.
